value.def: An adventurer is a person who enjoys going to new, unusual, and exciting places.

example.tran: 不择手段的机会主义者和野心勃勃的政治投机者

value.def: If you describe someone as an adventurer, you disapprove of them because they are using dishonest or immoral methods to gain money or power.
value.tran: 投机取巧者；用不正当手段谋求钱财（或权利）者
